nodes.text: Drexler Ambar was a famous outdoorsman and hunter living on the moon Neftali. He married Keturah, and the pair raised seven sons and daughter all while operating Ambar's Big Game, Tackle, and Gear Shop. On the evening of Ambar's sixtieth wedding anniversary, he went out to check the ice pools and traps and never returned. Searches for Ambar found nothing, but Keturah refused to give up on her husband. For ten years, Keturah hiked to the top of the Orane Mountain to watch for signs of Ambar.
